description: Selwyn Traverse Trail takes you on an 11 km (7 mi), one-way journey across small creeks and through cedar forests.Starting in the upper reaches of 5 Mile near the trailhead for Tinfoil Hat and Andreas' Downhill (Valemount Bike Park), this southbound trail traverses a very nice bench land with several small creek crossings and some lovely mixed forests. The trail ends at the Packsaddle Creek parking area.
directions: Travel down 5th Ave through downtown Valemount and cross the railway tracks, then immediately turn right and follow Main St for 150m and then turn left onto Hillside Drive Travel up Hillside for 1 km to the 5-Mile Hill Road which forks to the right. Follow 5-Mile Hill Rd for 2.3 km to a small parking area and watch for the trailhead sign which is on your right.
title: Selwyn Traverse Trail
